archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.abstract: The collection consists of Chappell's original art work and related material, 1983-1985, for American Masterworks Library.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
See the
University of Virginia Library’s use policy.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Warren Chappell, Illustrations, 1983-1985, Accession #10204-ac, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Mr. Warren Chappell of Charlottesville, Virginia, gave his artwork to the Library on July 20, 1987.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection of original artwork by Warren Chappell, ca. 1983-1985, and undated, consists of ten pen and ink sketches and six setting-copy glossy prints of eight American literary figures, and two designs, a spread eagle logo and a quill pen and star. Chappell prepared the drawings of the American authors to illustrate a series of American literary classics.
